name: Border Control
description:
Defend America from murderous zombie hordes, waves of unwashed orcs, and the military stength of enemy nations all bent on the destruction of the homeland.


  • unrelenting wave-based combat requiring skill, speed and plenty of ammo pickups to overcome.

  • Battle across six maps with a variety of enemies and enemy types

  • Repel hostile invaders with an arsenal of weaponry fit for a border guard and take back control of the border.
